title: Zyra Ice Skin

embed.description: Zyra has not that much skins buyable (one haunted and fire) i could really see some frozen/crystal theme for her this year please Riot !

replies.body: Were zuschön der Skin, aber die ballern für Champs lieber Skins raus von denen es eh schon unmängen an Skins gibt

I like this idea. Zyra has only 3 skinns and only tow of them are nice, so why not.  I think Riot should give her a new Skin this year and if some People alerady have good ideas it´s gerat to share them. The Internet is full of gerat Skin ideas. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
